segments.text: I see the woman standing there, completely focused on drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost funny how completely unaware she is of the growing puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps overflowing, and I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread knowing that she could slip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are also oblivious to the danger, especially the boy climbing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they understood the risks of what they’re doing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something innocent about their mischief, yet I know it’s not safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
